mdRecord.dcterms:title: Two Haunted Houses; 01 of 01
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--NotesItems 1-134--Clippings ScrapbookPage 19; "2 Haunted Houses. Mansion's Legend of Terror."; Discusses a haunted house built in Queen Elizabeth's time, and owned by the Earl of Devon. A nun was believed to be placed alive in a walled coffin. Some state they have heard and seen the ghosts of the nun and the man chasing her.; Daily Dispatch; DF 654
